definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="EnchantmentLevel">EnchantmentLevel</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="293" y="48"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Firefighter</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_isburning"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_extinguish"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
